survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from guests who have recently stayed at an Airbnb property to assess their overall experience, satisfaction levels, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with your recent Airbnb stay?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with your recent Airbnb stay?

questions.question_text: What aspects of your stay met or exceeded your expectations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question; limit to 6 options for readability.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes; allow selection of multiple options.

script.question_text: What aspects of your stay met or exceeded your expectations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any issues you encountered during your stay.
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field; optional question based on routing logic.

script.question_text: Please describe any issues you encountered during your stay.
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q1

questions.question_text: How likely are you to book an Airbnb again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. This question is critical for measuring customer loyalty.

script.question_text: How likely are you to book an Airbnb again in the future?
